name: NoTemp'o
description:
In NoTemp'o, travel across Italy to uncover evidence of your husband's disappearance and investigate the time anomalies surrounding you.

By freezing certain environmental elements and characters in time, forge different paths and delve deeper into your investigation in the heart of Italy.

Every risk you undertake gives you access to new information that will help you achieve your goal. Unleash your creativity and methodically choose your approach to the world.

------------------

Once the game tested, don't forget to answer our google form here!
